subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The trooper Ed Joyner of the Pennsylvania State Police, who was barred from continuing to work as a part-time assistant for Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger, wants the agency to let him return to that job.
snippet: The trooper Ed Joyner of the Pennsylvania State Police, who was barred from continuing to work as a part-time assistant for Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger, wants the agency to let him return to that job.
